SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The controlled terminology standard subset that includes terms pertaining to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Analysis Data Model (ADaM).
The controlled terminology standard subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization (CDASH) group.
The controlled terminology standard subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Define-XML standard.
The controlled terminology standard subset that includes terms pertaining to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM).
The controlled terminology standard subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Standard for Exchange of Non-clinical Data (SEND) group.
